name: Magical Sponge
description:
Running and chasing dinosaurs through an open world is a blast in the new run dino game for mobile devices. Players must jump, run and climb to avoid obstacles and catch the speedy dinosaurs. The game is easy to pick up and hard to put down, making it the perfect game for on-the-go fun.

Bright and adorable graphics Swift and simple gameplay. Rhythmic background audio. Music store to choose your favorite track from. Challenging to master the gameplay.
